Plot enriched gene sets

Source: R/plotEnrichedGeneSets-methods.R
plotEnrichedGeneSets.Rd

Plot enriched gene sets

plotEnrichedGeneSets(object, ...)

# S4 method for FGSEAList
plotEnrichedGeneSets(
  object,
  collection,
  direction = c("both", "up", "down"),
  n = 10L,
  headerLevel = 3L
)

Arguments

object

Object.
collection

character(1). Gene set collection name. Typically refers to h (hallmark), c1-c7 collections from MSigDb. Can obtain using collectionNames() on FGSEAList object.
direction

character(1). Include "both", "up", or "down" directions.
n

integer(1). Number to include.
headerLevel

integer(1) (1-7). Markdown header level.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

ggplot.

Note

Updated 2020-09-18.

See also

plotGeneSet().

Examples

## This requires MSigDB to be installed at `${HOME}`.
if (isTRUE(dir.exists(file.path("~", "msigdb")))) {
    data(fgsea)
    alphaThreshold(fgsea) <- 0.9
    plotEnrichedGeneSets(fgsea, collection = "h", n = 1L)
}

#> 
#> 
#> ### condition_B_vs_A {.tabset}
#> 
#> ℹ 6 upregulated gene sets detected (alpha < 0.9; nes > 0).
#> ℹ 7 downregulated gene sets detected (alpha < 0.9; nes > 0).
#> 
#> 
#> #### HALLMARK_PANCREAS_BETA_CELLS
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> #### HALLMARK_OXIDATIVE_PHOSPHORYLATION
#> 
#> 
#> 
#> ### treatment_D_vs_C {.tabset}
#> 
#> ℹ 3 upregulated gene sets detected (alpha < 0.9; nes > 0).
#> ℹ 2 downregulated gene sets detected (alpha < 0.9; nes > 0).

#> 
#> #### HALLMARK_PANCREAS_BETA_CELLS
